name: Popeye the Sailor Man
description:
The adventures of Popeye the Sailor Man. It's a 2D side scrolling platform action game, where you must get to skull island to save the kidnapped Olive Oyl. 

The game can be played by one or two players (either taking turns or simultaneous co-op play.)

The game also supports game pads, however control bindings cannot be changed at this time. 

Also included is a copy of my initial build, that is far less  detailed.
